name: Car Mechanic - Junkyard Tycoon
description:
Start your own business as car mechanic in your fathers inherited junkyard, work hard as a car mechanic. Provide repairing services as well as remodel old vintage cars. Perform all the tasks like changing tires, fitting new alloy rims, paint vintage old cars , remodels old cars and make them look new and become ultimate Junkyard tycoon in car business. Download now to enjoy junkyard tycoon.

Features of Car Mechanic - Junkyard Tycoon:
Multiple cars to repair at junkyard
3D junkyard environment with old vintage cars
Multiple tools to use for different levels
Character selection between male & female models
